entity.name: Italy records first coronavirus death after a spike in cases
entity.description: According to Italian media, a person has died after at least 14 people in the region of Lombardy and two in the nearby region of Veneto were confirmed to be infected with the virus.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
@realDonaldTrump - Italy #Coronavirus cases spike to over 880 .... 
- Saudi Arabia suspends aircraft arrivals
- Japan closes all schools
- Australia declares “pandemic” and prepares for worst 
- Dow closes on a 10 yr. low
- Trump tweets about his “rally”. Upset that Sanders is losing to Biden.
